channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for AK
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for AK

item.title: Report X-2023100714
item.description:
Report X-2023100714

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-15T15:11:35+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-03
  • City: ANC
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: ALASKA AIRLINES, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: X-202310074-X RAYED SHIPMENT AND SAW AN OUTINE THAT I THOUGHT MAY BE A KEROSINE CAN. PERFORMED A PHYSICAL SEARCH AND FOUND NAIL POLISH, NAIL POLISH REMOVER, CLEANSING SOLUTION AND LIGHTERS. X-2023100715 -X RAYED SHIPMENT AND SAW AN OUTINE THAT I THOUGHT MAY BE A KEROSINE CAN. PERFORMED A PHYSICAL SEARCH AND FOUND NAIL POLISH, NAIL POLISH REMOVER, CLEANSING SOLUTION AND LIGHTERS. X-2023100716-X RAYED SHIPMENT AND SAW AN OUTINE THAT I THOUGHT MAY BE A KEROSINE CAN. PERFORMED A PHYSICAL SEARCH AND FOUND NAIL POLISH, NAIL POLISH REMOVER, CLEANSING SOLUTION AND LIGHTERS. X-2023100717-X RAYED SHIPMENT AND SAW AN OUTINE THAT I THOUGHT MAY BE A KEROSINE CAN. PERFORMED A PHYSICAL SEARCH AND FOUND NAIL POLISH, NAIL POLISH REMOVER, CLEANSING SOLUTION AND LIGHTERS.

item.title: Report X-2023100425
item.description:
Report X-2023100425

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-14T18:12:23+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-11
  • City: ANC
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: ALASKA AIRLINES, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: While screening bags for an awb found some hazardous items. 1 Bear spray, 1 Flex Seal,1 Off bug spray, 1 dry shampoo all which are highly flammable, there was also a power bank and a lighter. This customer was asked by the receiving agent if they did have any hazardous items to report but the customer said no.

item.title: Report X-2023100015
item.description:
Report X-2023100015

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-09T18:13:50+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-28
  • City: ANCHORAGE
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: On Sept 28th, during the morning sort a plastic jerrican was found that had developed a leak after it was dropped due to a poorly build pallet. The jerrican contained UN1824, Sodium hydroxide solution, 8, II. The package was placed into a salvage drum and is being held pending disposition.

item.title: Report X-2023090838
item.description:
Report X-2023090838

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-09T18:13:50+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-05
  • City: FAI
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: ALASKA AIRLINES, INC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: X-2023090838-Had put totes through x-ray and then had to physical search because of the items that showed in the x-ray phase and we needed to verify what was in the totes. Opened up the totes to find multiple items that were not declared. X-2023090839-Multiple items were found while screening totes. Attached pictures of items. One of the totes had fluid in the bottom and on items that we do not know what type of fluid it is. there is a compressor of some type that we do not know if it is hazardous or not MEK 1 gallon Arposolve- Isopropanol 1 gallon X-2023090840-Multiple items were found while screening totes. Attached pictures of items. One of the totes had fluid in the bottom and on items that we do not know what type of fluid it is. there is a compressor of some type that we do not know if it is hazardous or not MEK 1 gallon Arposolve- Isopropanol 1 gallon
